季.definition: season; the last month of a season; fourth or youngest amongst brothers; classifier for seasonal crop yields

季世.definition: final phase; end of a historical era

季冬.definition: final month of winter (i.e. twelfth month of lunar calendar)

季夏.definition: final month of summer (i.e. sixth month of lunar calendar)

季子.definition: youngest brother; a period of two or three months

季春.definition: final month of spring (i.e. third month of lunar calendar)

季經.definition: (coll.) menstruation that comes only once every three months

季羨林.definition: Ji Xianlin (1911-2009), Chinese linguist and Indologist

季諾.definition: a promise that can be realized

季路.definition: Ji Lu (542-480 BC), disciple of Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3], also known as 子路[Zi3 Lu4]

季軍.definition: third in a race; bronze medalist

季黎諾.definition: Quirinius, governor of Syria (c. 51 BC - AD 21)
